text: Achan Pattalam is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nooranadu Ramachandran, starring Jeevan Joseph John and Shanthi Krishna in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/achan-pattalam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Jeevan Joseph John * Shanthi Krishna ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Achan Pattalam
